---
title: Cache
slug: Glossary/Cache
tags:
  - Glossary
  - HTTP
---
<p>A <strong>cache </strong>(web cache or HTTP cache) is a component that stores HTTP responses temporarily so that it can be used for subsequent HTTP requests as long as it meets certain conditions.</p>

</ul>
